players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked that Charlie was found dead. We should all share our thoughts to figure out who the mafia is."
You: "I'm saddened by Charlie's death. We should discuss calmly and share any thoughts without rushing to judgments."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation. Alice is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote with me to end this."
Diana: "Bob, what made you choose to investigate Alice last night? We need more details to trust this."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Charlie was found dead. We should all share our thoughts to figure out who the mafia is."
Alice: "I'm saddened by Charlie's death. We should discuss calmly and share any thoughts without rushing to judgments."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "I stand by my investigation. Alice is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote with me to end this."
Diana: "Bob, what made you choose to investigate Alice last night? We need more details to trust this."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
